# Starting Equipment
In the bag on your person you will find the following equipment:
-A [color=#028ed9]survival box[/color], containing equipment to help you survive emergency scenarios -A [color=#CC6633]traffic control key[/color], which can be slotted into your radio headset to utilize the traffic control radio channel -A [color=#33bbff]medical implant[/color]. If you inject it, when you get incapacitated, it'll tell your location to medics. Click the implanter to equip it in your hand, and click it again to inject it into your body.
Find your headset by opening your inventory (backpack icon, bottom left corner).
# Suit Sensors
Suit Sensors can coordinate your position to anyone with a crew monitoring console, typically used by medical personnel.
The sensor options are the following:
-Off: Disables tracking -Binary: Shows Alive or Dead on a crew monitor -Vitals: Shows your vital status (Good, Okay, Poor, Bad, Critical) on a crew monitor -Coordinates: Shows your X and Y coordinates on a crew monitor
To enable them, perform the following actions:
-Right click your jumpsuit -Select the option you wish, typically coordinates are the most useful.
